questions: Tell me about your Chardonnay.
What wines do you offer?
Do you have Sauvignon Blanc?
Can you give me details about your red wines?
What is the alcohol content of your wines?
Do you have any sparkling wines?
Can you recommend a wine for a special occasion?
What are your best-selling wines?
Do you have any wine tasting notes?
What food pairs well with your Cabernet Sauvignon?
Are your wines available for purchase online?
Do you have limited release wines?
Can you tell me more about your white wines?
answers: We offer a variety of wines, including our popular Napa Valley Chardonnay and Sauvignon Blanc. Our Chardonnay is aged in a combination of new and neutral American Oak, offering a balanced and slightly creamy mouthfeel.
Our Napa Valley Chardonnay is well-balanced and aged for 10 months in 40% new American Oak barrels.
Yes, we have a Sauvignon Blanc sourced from North Coast vineyards, aged in 100% stainless steel barrels.
We offer red wines like Pinot Noir, Merlot blends, Cabernet Sauvignon, Mendocino Rougette, Zinfandel, and Petite Sirah.
The alcohol content varies by wine. For example, our Napa Valley Chardonnay has an alcohol content of 14.8%, while our Sauvignon Blanc has an alcohol content of 15.1%.
Currently, we do not offer sparkling wines. Our focus is on still wines, including whites, reds, and blends.
For a special occasion, I recommend our Juel, which is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and Petit Verdot. It's elegant and perfect for celebrations.
Our best-selling wines include our Napa Valley Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, and our red blend Juel.
Yes, we provide detailed tasting notes for each of our wines. You can find these on our website or in our tasting room.
Our Cabernet Sauvignon pairs wonderfully with grilled meats, hearty stews, and aged cheeses.
Yes, our wines are available for purchase online. You can visit our website to place an order.
We do offer limited release wines. These are available to our wine club members and during special events.
Our white wines include Napa Valley Chardonnay and Sauvignon Blanc, both known for their balanced flavors and crisp finishes.

questions: What are your visiting hours?
When are you open?
What time do you close?
Where are you located?
How do I get to Jessup Cellars?
What's your address?
Do you have parking available?
Is there public transportation nearby?
Are you open on weekends?
What holidays are you closed?
Can I visit without a reservation?
Do you have guided tours?
Is your location wheelchair accessible?
answers: Jessup Cellars is open from 10 AM to 5:30 PM, seven days a week.
We are open daily from 10 AM to 5:30 PM.
We close at 5:30 PM every day.
We are located at 6740 Washington St., Yountville, CA.
You can reach us at 6740 Washington St., Yountville, CA, just a block north from The French Laundry.
Our address is 6740 Washington St., Yountville, CA 94599.
Yes, we have parking available for our visitors.
Public transportation is available nearby. Please check local transit options for the best route.
Yes, we are open on weekends.
We are closed on major holidays such as Thanksgiving and Christmas.
Walk-ins are welcome, but we recommend making a reservation to ensure availability.
Yes, we offer guided tours of our winery and art gallery.
Our location is wheelchair accessible, and we strive to accommodate all our guests.

questions: Tell me about your art gallery.
Who is the current resident artist?
Do you have any art exhibitions?
What kind of art do you display?
Can I buy art from your gallery?
How often do you change the exhibits?
Do you host art events?
What is the current exhibition?
Are there any upcoming art shows?
Can I meet the artists?
Do you offer art workshops?
Is there an admission fee for the gallery?
Do you collaborate with local artists?
answers: Our art gallery features rotating installations by celebrated regional and national artists. Currently, our resident artist is Jermaine Danté.
Jermaine Danté is our current resident artist. His bold and evocative artwork is on display in our gallery.
Yes, we have regular art exhibitions. You can enjoy the art while sipping on your favorite Jessup wines.
We display a variety of art, including large format colorful creations curated by our lead artist.
Yes, you can purchase art from our gallery.
We change our exhibits every few months to showcase new and exciting artwork.
Yes, we host various art events, including openings and artist talks.
Our current exhibition features the works of Jermaine Danté.
Yes, we have several upcoming art shows. Please check our website for the latest schedule.
Occasionally, our artists are available for meet-and-greet events. Check our event calendar for details.
We offer occasional art workshops. Please check our website for upcoming dates.
There is no admission fee for the gallery. We welcome all visitors.
Yes, we frequently collaborate with local artists to bring fresh and diverse art to our gallery.

questions: What events do you host?
Tell me about the Art House Sessions.
Do you have any wine tasting events?
What experiences do you offer?
Can I book a private event?
What is the Art House Short Film Series?
Do you offer food and wine pairing events?
Are there any upcoming music events?
Can I host a corporate event at your venue?
Do you have seasonal events?
How can I find out about upcoming events?
Do you offer virtual wine tastings?
What is included in a wine tasting experience?
answers: We host various events, including our Art House Sessions summer music series and Art House Short Film Series.
Art House Sessions is our summer music series featuring live performances by regional and national artists.
Yes, we offer hosted wine tastings in our spacious gallery among curated art. You can also join our interactive experiences focusing on the arts.
You can enjoy wine tastings, art exhibitions, and our special events like Art House Sessions and Short Film Series.
Yes, we have space available for private events and special accommodations. Please contact us for more details.
The Art House Short Film Series is an event where we showcase short films curated by our team, focusing on various themes and genres.
We offer food and wine pairing events where you can enjoy our wines with carefully selected food pairings.
Yes, we have several upcoming music events. Please check our website for the latest schedule.
Our venue is available for corporate events. Please contact us for more details on booking and accommodations.
We host seasonal events throughout the year, including harvest celebrations and holiday gatherings.
You can find out about upcoming events by visiting our website or signing up for our newsletter.
We offer virtual wine tastings where you can enjoy a guided tasting experience from the comfort of your home.
A wine tasting experience includes a selection of our wines, guided by our knowledgeable staff, and often includes insights into the winemaking process and tasting notes.

questions: What are the benefits of your wine club?
How can I join the wine club?
What do I get as a wine club member?
Is there a fee to join the wine club?
What wines are included in the wine club?
How often do I receive wine shipments?
Can I customize my wine shipments?
Do you offer different levels of membership?
Are there any exclusive events for wine club members?
What discounts do wine club members receive?
Can I gift a wine club membership?
What is the cancellation policy for the wine club?
How do I update my wine club membership information?
answers: Our wine club offers exclusive benefits including quarterly shipments of our hand-selected wines, access to limited release wines, complimentary tastings, and special discounts on purchases.
You can join our wine club by visiting our website or by signing up in our tasting room.
As a wine club member, you receive quarterly wine shipments, access to exclusive wines, complimentary tastings, and discounts on wine purchases and events.
There is no fee to join our wine club, but you will be billed for each shipment of wine.
The wines included in the wine club shipments vary, featuring a selection of our most popular and exclusive wines.
Wine shipments are sent quarterly to our members.
Yes, you can customize your wine shipments to suit your preferences.
We offer different levels of membership with varying benefits and shipment sizes. Please visit our website for more details.
Yes, we host exclusive events for our wine club members, including special tastings and release parties.
Wine club members receive a discount on all wine purchases and select events. The exact discount varies by membership level.
Yes, you can gift a wine club membership to friends or family. Please contact us for more details.
You can cancel your wine club membership at any time. Please contact us to process your cancellation.
To update your wine club membership information, please log into your account on our website or contact our customer service team.
